metadata.title: CVE-2018-11385 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Security component in Symfony 2.7.x before2.7.48, 2.8.x before 2.8.41, 3.3.x before 3.3.17, 3.4.x before 3.4.11, and4.0.x before 4.0.11. A session fixation vulnerability within the "Guard"login feature may allow an attacker to impersonate a victim towards the webapplication if the session id value was previously known to the attacker.

criterions.comment: symfony: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
